title: Standard or Ur and Palette of Narmer-similarities

content.prompt: Which of the following statements is true of both the Standard of Ur from the Royal Tombs at Ur and the Palette of King Narmer?

choices.label: They designate the king as a sun god.

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
